name: Candied Pecans
comments: These are nice munchables that I will make every Christmas
instructions: Brush large cookie sheet with butter. Whisk egg white until foamy, then add all ingredients except pecans; whisk again until mixture is thick and opaque. Mix in nuts and lift out with forks; transfer to cookie sheet, in single layer.
Bake until deep golden brown, about 25 minutes. Cool completely on cookie sheet and store at room temperature.
